remarks: A (matrix) element of the result of an inverse matrix transformation. (Contributed by AV, 14-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cpm2mfval.i $e |- I = ( N cPolyMatToMat R ) $.
cpm2mfval.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpm2mvalel $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. S ) /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N ) ) -> ( X ( I ` M ) Y ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( X M Y ) ) ` 0 ) ) $.
